data.title: 30 Revealing Signs Your Partner Is ‘Wifey Material’
images: https://www.marriage.com/advice/pre-marriage/wifey-material/
data.meta_description: It is easier to invest in a relationship, if you know that your partner is worth the investment. Read here the signs your lover is ‘wifey material’
data.meta_site_name: Marriage Advice - Expert Marriage Tips & Advice
data.text:
Listen to this article

Defining what makes someone suitable for a long-term commitment can be a delicate and nuanced endeavor. Relationships, after all, are built on a multitude of qualities and shared values that go beyond surface-level attributes.

However, for those contemplating the possibility of a lifelong partnership, it becomes essential to identify certain qualities that indicate a strong foundation for a committed future.

In this article, we explore thirty signs that may give you meaningful insights into recognizing those attributes that often align with the notion of ‘wifey material.’

It is important to remember that this exploration is not intended to generalize or stereotype individuals but rather to offer a holistic perspective on some common positive traits that may be present in a committed and nurturing partner.

What is wifey material?

As the name might suggest, the phrase “wifey material” is used to describe women who have the qualities of a good wife.

While the ideal marriage qualities and wifey duties will vary based upon each person’s preferences, there are several traits that most would agree make someone wife material.

While everyone’s preferred qualities in a wife will be slightly different, what ultimately makes a woman wifey material is being a good partner to her spouse and willing to work with them on making their relationship better long-term.

Qualities like maturity, financial responsibility, and the willingness to stand by you through difficulties can be characteristics of a woman with wifey material traits. Still, there are some more specific signs to look for, which are discussed in further detail below.

Is wifey material a compliment or a bad stereotype?

While many people wonder what makes a woman wife material, sometimes the phrase “wifey” comes with a negative connotation.

For example, some people feel that this phrase is sexist and implies that women only strive to be desired by a man as if they are some prize and will only be selected if they meet all of a man’s expectations.

Furthermore, some women may have no desire to marry, and they do not feel that they need a man’s approval to have worth.

Some women may have no interest in pleasing a man, and their sights are set on giving back to their communities or growing their careers. To imply that their good qualities are only valuable if a man desires them can be seen as offensive.

For the sake of this article, though, the goal is not to be condescending to women but rather to give an idea of what qualities would make someone a solid lifelong partner.

The qualities discussed here generally indicate someone who will be a committed, loyal spouse, not just a temporary fling or whirlwind romance.

10 qualities that make her wifey material

Before you jump to a conclusion and dream about your romantic future together, it is important to understand if you are compatible. If you both have what it takes to be together forever.

When looking into the signs she is wifey material, it is important to consider the ten following qualities of a good wife:

The ability to handle setbacks in life

Caring for herself physically

A kind personality

Being able to love you for you

Someone who is goal-oriented

She gets along with your family

Values in common with you

Financial management skills

A positive outlook

A willingness to confront you when you’re wrong

30 signs she’s wifey material

The above qualities to look for in a wife can give you an idea of whether or not your partner is wifey material, but some specific signs can help you be more confident.

Consider the following signs of what makes a woman wife material:

1. She doesn’t bring up your past mistakes

We all have a past, which probably includes some decisions we aren’t proud of.

A sign of a potential life partner is someone who respects your personal growth journey. A woman considered “wifey material” won’t hold your past mistakes against you, but it’s important to note that constructive conversations about personal growth can still be healthy in a relationship.

2. She accepts your quirks

Marriage isn’t always glamorous, so if she puts up with your quirks without complaint, she’s probably the one. This means she won’t make a big deal out of your annoying traits or imperfections.

Marriage involves accepting each other’s imperfections. While it’s great that she tolerates your quirks, it’s equally important for you to reciprocate. A balanced relationship requires both partners to embrace each other’s unique qualities.

3. She’s there for you during the ups and downs

A girlfriend who is only around during the good times cannot be a good long-term partner. Life is never perfect, and it will come with struggles.

A loyal wife will support you, even during the tough times, and help you through whatever life throws your way.

A strong relationship is one where both partners support each other through thick and thin. It’s important to remember that being there for each other doesn’t mean only one partner supporting the other; mutual support during both good and challenging times is essential for a lasting relationship.

4. She gives you second chances

As life is never perfect, relationships are also imperfect.

Forgiveness and second chances are vital for any relationship, but this should be a two-way street. A woman who is “wifey material” should expect the same level of forgiveness and understanding from you when she makes mistakes.

5. She makes an effort to get to know your friends

Even when we enter into a marriage, we still need friends in our lives.

If she can get along with your friends and even hang out with them once in a while, this shows that the important people are also important to her. This is a sign that she has strong marriage qualities.

6. You find her attractive, even when she isn’t dolled up

Looks aren’t everything, but some physical attraction keeps the spark alive in a marriage.

When you’ve fallen for the woman who is meant to be your wife, you will find her beautiful when she’s wearing old sweatpants and has no makeup on.

Attraction is essential, but it’s important to remember that physical attraction is just one facet of a healthy relationship. True “wifey material” goes beyond physical appearance, encompassing emotional and intellectual connections as well.

7. You see her as your best friend

One of the qualities to look for in a wife is someone who can be your lover and your friend. This is a lifelong partner, so a strong friendship is critical.

Viewing your partner as a best friend is valuable, but it’s also essential to maintain the romantic aspect of the relationship. Striking a balance between friendship and romance is key.

8. She knows how to be independent

Indeed, spouses rely on each other for support and shared decision-making, but you don’t want her to depend on you for every single decision.

A wifey materialist knows how to be independent and do her own thing, and she is capable of making daily decisions without always needing advice.

9. She is committed to being there “In sickness and in health”

When you spend your life with someone, there will be times of sickness. If she can stand by your side and care for you when you are down, she is more than just a short-term girlfriend.

Commitment during difficult times is a sign of a strong partner. However, both partners should be equally committed to each other’s well-being and should work together to support each other through challenges.

10. She’s financially independent

There is nothing wrong with one spouse being the breadwinner or staying home with the kids, but one of the fastest ways to destroy a marriage is arguments over money.

Financial independence is a sign of responsibility and self-sufficiency. In a balanced relationship, financial independence should be a shared goal, with both partners contributing to their financial well-being.

11. She views you as an equal

A marriage is a lifelong partnership in which both partners’ opinions, preferences, feelings, and abilities are considered. A wifey material will see you as being equal to her rather than trying to control all the decisions.

12. She pushes you to be the best version of yourself

A spouse should be your biggest cheerleader, always supporting you and pushing you to reach your goals.

Being supportive and encouraging is a vital aspect of a loving partnership. In a balanced relationship, both partners should motivate each other to reach their goals and be the best they can be.

13. She is selfless

Sometimes, marriage means sacrificing your desires for the good of your partner or the relationship. This means that one of the qualities to look for in a wife isn’t selfish.

Selflessness is a wonderful quality, but it should be mutual. In a healthy relationship, both partners should be willing to make sacrifices for the well-being of the relationship and each other.

14. She doesn’t expect you to be tough all the time

One of the signs of what makes a woman wife material is that she accepts your vulnerable side. This means that she will nurture you when you are dealing with intense emotions, and she won’t pass judgment if you show your soft side or cry.

15. She is willing to try new things in the bedroom

Physical intimacy is an important part of most marriages, and keeping the spark alive can be difficult when you’ve been with someone for years.

A wife material will be open to experimenting with you in the bedroom because she wants to keep the passion in the relationship.

16. She gets along with your mom or at least makes an effort

Unless you want your life to involve constant mediation between your mother and your wife, it’s important to marry someone who gets along with your mom.

Being able to get along with your family, in general, is a good sign.

17. You can make compromises with her

Someone who isn’t willing to budge and has to have their way probably won’t make a happy marriage.

She should be ready to compromise, sometimes giving a little to make you happy, instead of expecting you to give in to her every demand.

18. She believes in your dreams

A woman who is wifey material won’t ask you to give up your dreams for her. They will be necessary to her, too, and she will want to see you achieve them.

19. Your career is important to her

When you find a good woman to marry, she will support your career goals just as much as her own because she wants the two of you to be successful as a team.

20. She knows when to give you space

Marriage means sharing life, but that doesn’t mean you won’t each need your own free time and separate interests.

If she can give you space to spend time with friends or do your own thing, this is one of the characteristics of a good wife.

21. She shows interest in the things that are important to you

Football may not be her favorite thing, but if she is wifey material, she will at least attempt to learn more about it or take an interest when you talk about it.

22. The two of you have shared values

You don’t have to agree about everything, but generally, having the same values is important.

For example, if one of you is set on having kids, but the other doesn’t want any children, this is problematic.

23. She allows you to make your own decisions

In a marriage, couples make important decisions together, but there are some times when you need the freedom to make your own choices. If she can be with you without dictating every decision you make, she is wifey material.

24. She shares responsibilities with you

Part of marriage is knowing that you have a partner who will always have your back and contribute their fair share to the household.

This means you want a wife who can share responsibilities with you, not a damsel in distress who relies on you to take the reins in all aspects of your life together.

25. You feel listened to when you talk to her

A wife material will genuinely listen to your response when she asks you how your day was. Your words and feelings matter to her, and that’s why she will pay special attention to what you have to say.

26. She can have an intelligent conversation

Marriage means growing old with someone and having an intelligent discussion can keep the intimacy alive as the years pass.

One of the wife material traits is the ability to converse about intellectual matters, rather than trivial affairs like the latest fashion trends.

27. She’s physically affectionate

Whether in the form of hugging, kissing, or cuddling, physical affection can keep couples connected. A woman who isn’t afraid to show physical affection makes for a happy marriage.

28. She’s a good communicator

If she can communicate effectively, such as staying positive, handling conflict without becoming defensive, and expressing herself clearly, these are all qualities of a good wife.

Research shows that effective communication leads to higher marital satisfaction.

29. She’s considerate

With gender equality becoming the norm, men want a woman who considers their needs, too. Sure, it’s okay to want to spoil your wife, but she should spoil you, too.

Showing consideration can be as simple as picking up the tab at dinner or putting gas in your car.

30. You feel in your gut that she’s the one

People often talk about just “knowing” that their girlfriend was the woman they wanted to marry.

If you feel that she’s the one for you and you cannot imagine life without her, she is probably wifey material.

Watch this video to learn more about whether you should trust your gut:

What does it mean when a guy says you are wifey material?

Some people may argue that the phrase “wifey material” has a negative connotation coming from men, but the reality is that most men today want a partner.

Historically, men may have preferred a woman who stayed at home, raised the kids, and cared for the house, but what men look for in a wife today has changed.

Most of them value equality between the sexes and want a partner who will take care of them just as much as they care for their partner.

Commonly asked questions

Here are the answers to some pressing questions that can help you gain more clarity about the qualities that are desirous in a long-term partner:

What if my girlfriend doesn’t have all of these qualities?

It’s important to remember that no one is perfect. Instead of expecting your girlfriend to possess all these qualities, focus on open communication and personal growth for both of you. Understand that people have strengths and weaknesses, and a successful relationship is built on acceptance and compromise.

How can I tell if my girlfriend is ready to get married?

Observe her communication about the future, her willingness to compromise, and her eagerness to build a life together. Ensure you both share common values, life goals, and a strong emotional connection. Discuss your intentions openly to gauge her readiness for marriage.

What are some common mistakes people make when choosing a spouse?

Common mistakes include rushing into marriage without knowing each other well, ignoring red flags, and prioritizing superficial qualities over compatibility. Successful marriages require thorough communication, shared values, and a solid foundation of friendship.

What are some things I can do to make my relationship stronger?

To strengthen your relationship, prioritize open and honest communication. Show appreciation, actively listen, and engage in shared activities. Invest time in building trust and addressing conflicts maturely. Most importantly, keep the romance alive by nurturing your emotional and physical connection.

How can I deal with conflict in my relationship?

Conflict is normal in any relationship. Approach it with patience and empathy, actively listening to your partner’s perspective. Focus on finding solutions together rather than placing blame. Seek compromise and use disagreements as opportunities for growth and understanding, ultimately strengthening your bond.

Conclusion

Not everyone takes the phrase ‘wifey material’ as a compliment, but here, we view the term positively. Having the qualities of a good wife suggests that a woman is able to be a committed partner and carry her weight in the relationship.

These are qualities men look for in a woman because they make for a happy marriage.

That doesn’t mean that marriage has to be your priority, but if you aspire to someday get married or if you are looking for advice on how to choose a strong partner, the above signs of wifey material can lead you to a spouse who will provide you with lifelong happiness.
